data.title: Demi Moore Elevates Springtime Inspiration in Vibrant Yellow Oscar de la Renta Dress With 3D Floral Details for Chopard’s Cannes Film Festival 2024 Party
data.meta_description: Demi Moore fashioned a strapless yellow gown by Oscar de la Renta and jewelry by Chopard for Chopard’s Cannes Film Festival 2024 Party.
data.text:
If you purchase an independently reviewed product or service through a link on our website, WWD may receive an affiliate commission.

Demi Moore made the case for vibrant yellow while attending Chopard’s “Once Upon a Time” event during the Cannes Film Festival on Tuesday. The star of “The Substance,” which held its premiere at this year’s Cannes Film Festival, fashioned a look wholly evocative of the springtime season, embracing florals and more.

For her appearance at the event, Moore wore a floor-length dress courtesy of Oscar de la Renta, which featured a high slit, short train and gathered fabric at the waist. The look included a pop of contrasting shades of pink and blue with two floral appliqués at the waist.

Moore continued her floral sartorial theme with statement earrings courtesy of , which featured layers of flowers cascading down the accessory pieces. As for her footwear, Moore fashioned a pair of bubblegum pink pointed toe pumps by Christian Louboutin.

Moore’s entire look was evocative of all the best and brightest elements of the springtime season. The actress’ raven-black hair was styled by Stephen Beaver, with a clean makeup look courtesy of Alex Babsky. Moore’s entire ensemble was curated by longtime stylist Brad Goreski.

Moore has wholly embraced her time at the 2024 Film Festival, fashioning pieces that speak to her approach to style. For the red carpet premiere of her film “The Substance” on Sunday, Moore opted for 3D asymmetry with a sculptural gown courtesy of Schiaparelli’s spring 2024 couture collection.

Moore also embraced the black and white trend that’s been seen during this year’s , wearing a plunging polka-dot dress by Elie Saab the following Monday.

Moore was in good company at Chopard’s “Once Upon a Time” event during the Cannes Film Festival. Among the A-list stars who attended the evening’s festivities, Bella Hadid fashioned a striking, backless cocktail dress by Dsquared2, while Bella Thorne opted for contrasting fabrics for her look.

Below, view style from the Cannes Film Festival 2024 red carpet.
